text: Institute of Engineering and Management, New Town Campus University of Engineering and Management, Kolkata Assignment-7, First/Second Semester-2025 Course Name: Introduction to AI and Data Science using Python Laboratory Course Code: ESCCS192/ESCCS292 1 Write a program in Python to calculate the factorial of a number using user-defined function. 2 Input a number and check whether a given number is prime or not using functions. 3 Input a number and check whether it is Armstrong or not using functions. 4 Input a number and check whether it is Krishnamurthy or not using functions. 5 Input a number and check whether the number is perfect or not using functions. 6 Write program in python to display reverse of a number using function.
